subject: Hockey, Ice
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Kuzkin, a three-time Olympic champion, played 169 times for the U.S.S.R., scoring 18 goals, and was inducted into the International Ice Hockey Federation Hall of Fame in 2005.
snippet: Mr. Kuzkin, a three-time Olympic champion, played 169 times for the U.S.S.R., scoring 18 goals, and was inducted into the International Ice Hockey Federation Hall of Fame in 2005.
